questions.passage:
Dear all employees,

I would like to let you know that management has decided to postpone the company workshop, which was scheduled for December 3. As you know, we are dealing with the biggest order ____145____ we have ever received. It will be too difficult ____146____ the event into our schedule at this busy time. ____147____ Mr. Lee in the HR Department will e-mail you as soon as the date is set. If you have any ____148____ questions, feel free to contact Mr. Lee at (055) 343-6655.

subQuestions.question: Choose the correct word for blank 145
subQuestions.explanation: **that** ƒë∆∞·ª£c ∆∞u ti√™n sau 'the biggest' (so s√°nh nh·∫•t). 'The biggest order that we have ever received'.

üìå Ph√¢n bi·ªát:

questions.passage:
MCC Preschool provides children with a quality education and care in a safe environment. We accept children from 8 months of age to preschool age. We have been licensed by the state of Hawaii for the past 30 years and have been trying our best to promote children's development and education. MCC is trying to meet the needs of in-state working parents by taking good care of their children while they are at work.

We are also open to out-of-state families who want to continue their children's education while they are still on vacation. MCC allows families to enjoy their vacation in Hawaii while their children engage in cultural and educational opportunities. For more information about us, please call us at (808) 223-2223.

subQuestions.question: What is this information mainly about?
subQuestions.explanation:
N·ªôi dung ch√≠nh: MCC Preschool cung c·∫•p gi√°o d·ª•c ch·∫•t l∆∞·ª£ng cho tr·∫ª em ‚Üí **A**.

options.C: They are trying to move to Hawaii.

subQuestions.explanation:
